content: /tprabhaathatthinte srashdaavum, andhakaaratthe maayichukallanyu srshdikallkku prakaasham nalki santoshippikkunnavanumaaya kartthaave! Nyangallil paripaakathayulllla nadapadikall srshdich, paapaandhakaaratthe nyangallilninnu poornnamaayi neekkikkallayename. Nyangallude kartthaavum nithya daivavume! Ninte krpayude mahaneeyakiranangallaal nyangalle prashobhippichu santoshippikkukayum cheyyaname.

Kanyakayaayu vimalathayil
Ninneppettavallodoppam
Naathhaa! Devaa!- nalkuka
Yogyatha nin sthuthi paadaan

Nin jananee mariyaam-snaapakanaam yoohaano-
Nennivararththhikkum-ninnodu nyangallkkaayu krpa cheytheedename.

Pethgomo-krpa cheyyaname naathhaa! Krpa cheyyaname
Devaadheeshaa!-naathhaa! Thirumumpil
Nyangallanachoree-parimalladhoopatthaal paapam
Neekkaname-pizhapokkaname
Seebaayaal rakshichavanaam
Jivasuthaa! Karunaadivase
Ninvalamaayu nyangalle nirtthaname.

Nayanaagocharamaa-muyaratthil ninnum
Ninmaahaathmyatthe-tthaazhtthi svahithatthaal naranaay
Durbalaraamaadaamyarude thaathajane svayamulabhoothaa!
Aadhivyaadhikallettheertthon
Sthuthi naathhaa!-thavamaanam dhanyam.

Seenaayu girinin savidhe vira poondu
Naathhaa! Deveshaa!-girivaaridhidharanaam ninne
Kanyakayaam mariyaamenti
Vezhpedaathavall garbhiniyaayu
Vachanaatheetham prasavichu
Thalsmrthiye vishruthamaakkaname.

Kanyakamariyaame!-shlommo ninnodu cho-
Nnathyunnatha doothan-nee perum raajeshvarane
Prasavicheedum vezhchavinaa
Srshdikall than prabhayaam raviye
Vaazhvezhumamme! Kanyakayaayu
Prasavicholl-nee saubhaagyavathi.
Subheading parishuddhanmaar

Unnatharaajyamathum-shaashvatha jeevithavum
Nirmmalaraarjikkum-satthama mashihaabhakthanmaa-
Rarhikkunna mahaabhaagyam
Jadanethram darshikkukayo
Shravanam kellkkukayo hrdayam
Therukayo cheythittillethum.

Sahaderothunnu-supriya shuddhasuthan
Svakaraajyenyangall-kkekeedum mudi shaashvathavum
Prathidaanam samrakshithavum
Eritheevaallmarddithar nyangall-
Kkaashvaasam mashihaayishdar-
Kkarulliyathaam-parudeesayilekum.

Mannavane! Mashihaa!-sathatham thavakarunaa-
Vaathilil muttunnen-dhanikaa! Nin nidhinilayatthi
Nnekaname krpayum vaazhvum
Neeyen gathi thuna cheyyuka nin
Saakshiye lajithanaakkaruthe
Sharanavumennaashrayavum neeye!

Raajyatthin vaathil -cheriyathumaamaargam
Veethi kuranyathumaa-naavazhi gamanam kaamkshippo-
Nathyuthsaahamavashyam thaan
Alasatha lesham baadhichaa-
Lashubhavazhikku vashamvadanaayu
Svaathmatthe-svayame nihanikkum.

Mashihaayude rooshmaa-maamodeesaayaal
Sampraapichoraay-thrppaavanathanu bhakshichu
Punyaninam paanam cheythor
Poozhiyil ninnum thaan moolam
Praananoderi dhoolli kuda
Nyathithejo-vasthram chaarttheedum.

Pethgomo-rjumathikallkkirullil dyuthiyullavaayi
Dyuthiyudayam cheythen kartthaave!
Koorirull neengumpoll ninne
Kooppunnu gaganam dharayennee
/tdruthamundaayoru sodarimaar
/tneerinmeethe vaanidamo
/tnnaparam neerinnaadhaaram
Nimishamuyarnnoru manavarayaa-
Moyaaraayathamaayu maddhye
Sthuthyam srshdividhaanam the.

Nirmmalamaamudare nirmmalamaayu
Vannu vasichoru nirmmalanaam
Aathmajane preshippichavanaam
/tnirmmala thaathan samsthuthyan
/tthansaamyam naam poondiduvaan
/tnammude saamyamavan poondu
Nammetthan pithrsutharaakki
Paavanaroohaayodu cherppaan
Maanavaroopam svayamettaan.

Praarththhippaan daivatthin mumpil
Mariyaam ninneedunnera-
Tthagnijvaalaavrthanaam doothan
/tsavidhe chennuracheythevam
/traajathanoojan mevumathaam
/tmanimandirame! Shlommo the!
Ninnilamarnneedum dhanavaan
Kshaamam janathaykkaattiduvaan
Ninnagathithvam maayichaan.

Bhaagyanidhee! Mariyaame! Daiva-
Praanaathmajaneppettolle!
Bhaaginidhee! Vaanijanaavaasam
/tcheythoru bhooshithamaam nauke!
/tambarashilppiyeyettenti
/tvrathashuddhyaa pettoramale!
Nisthulamaam manimandirame!
Bhaagyam the ninnil jaatham
Cheythaanaam naathhan dhanyan.

Nyaan sathya prabhayennudayon tha-
Nnantevaasikallodothi
Iprabhayil chernnu nadappone
/tirull pidikoodaa mashihaa than
/tprabhayil chernnu nadannoraam
/tshleehanmaarkkathi saubhaagyam
Kandaalum thal smrthiyengum
Kondaadeedunnathighosham
Thal praarththhana nammallkkabhayam.

Jeevakaram mrthikaramennevam
Kandirusaranikall sahadenmaar
Noothanamaam jeevithamaarjippaan
/tdurghadamaargam kaamkshichaar
/tdushdaathmaavodu padavetti
/tjayamoderipparayunnu
Aavashyakkaarkkaashrayavum
Bhakthanmaarkkanugaamiyumaam
Kartthaavin naamam dhanyam.

Kshemamodangezhunnelllluka saakshaa-
Lidayaa! Pandithanaayakane!
Keeppaapol sabhathannaadhaaram
/tmuttum paulosinu samane!
/tnibi nivahatthin priya sahajaa!
/tappostholasamoohasthhaa!
Eliyaapolujvalane!
Yoohaanon pol vrathaparane!
Ninne varichoru sabha dhanya.

Pethgomo-alivodu krpa cheyyuka naathhaa!
Aahvaanam cheyyum paapikallil
Krpaye vilakkaatthon devaa!
Aardrathayaal kopatthin vadiyum
/tthaadanavum neekkeedaname
/taanandeshvaryangallezhum
/tmaasaabdangalle nalkaname
Sleebaayude van rooshmaayaal
Viddhvamsikkuka dushdane ni-
Nnaardrathaye vaazhtthum nyangall.

Nin sthuthiyum haaleluyyaayum
Kartthaave! Nyaan nirttharuthe
Vidhi neethikkayyo cheyyaruthe
/tnyaan paathakiyennariyunnen
/tsarvvakadangallumaaraanyaal
/tnarakam thaanennavakaasham
Ninne villippaan kazhivenye
Maunam mrthiyaal nyaan pookum
Neekkuka krpayaalenpaapam.

Aashvaasam smrthiyodu mrthathaatha
Bhraathaakkallkkekeedaname
Nirtthaname thaavakapoojakare
/tparishuddhanmaarude nirayil
/tsimhaasanasamsthhithanaayu nee
/tsatthamaare thirayunneram
Vadhinilaye daya kandetthi
Thaavakamahimodayadivase
Ninvalamaayavar nilkkaname

Dhanikajanam kaazhchayumaayarththhikkum ninsampreethi haa… haa…
Anthpuramamarum nrpathanayamahaa mahimaavum
Anugatharaakum kanyakallaam sakhimaar-haa......Haa....
Poyidumavarathyaanandasametham

Shlomo paavanakanye! Parishuddhe!
Shlommo nirmmalamaayoru maanikyakkalle!
Shlomo sarvvacharaacharadhaari
Paraakramane prasavicholle!
Sakalakulangalluminimelanisham
Purusaubhaagyam the! Nalkum.

Pethgomo-kartthaavine vaazhtthum nyaanellaayppozhum
Daaveedusuthe! Mariyaame! Naravamshatthil
Sveekrthayaayoru ninnilni-
Nnudalettaathura naraneppol
Paranaayu vaazhse bhoojaatham
Cheythonaam mashihaa dhanyan
Nyangallkkaaytthan maahaathmyam
Thaazhtthee bhoothalamengum than
Maathaavin smrthiyathyantam
Varddhippichonaayu sthothram

Sveshdatthaale bhaagyamezhum mariyaamil ni-
Nnudalentiya daivikamaakum
Jeevanavachanam samsthuthyam
Meyyilumaathmaavilumoppam
Paaram nirmmalayaayu vaanaall
Avivaahithayaayu narabeejam
Koodaathe roohkkudishaayaal
Garbham poondu vachasinna-
Ngappuramaayu pettaall ninne

Maathrvishuddhasmrthisambandham nalkuka naathhaa!
Thal praarththhanayaal punyamivarkkum mrtharaayorkkum

Bhaagyavathee! Mariyaame! Nizhalaayu mooshapaninya
Pettiyathaal nee! Chithreekrthayaayu goodhaarththhatthil
Pettikkullllil daivikamaayoredukall pole
Nyastham ninnil sathyam mariyaam jeevanapoopam

Mrtharaayu modaal shaantyaamevunnore! Bhaagyam
Achaaram polavaril guptham nandanagaathram
Paathaallapraakaaram shakthyaa dhoollippon than
Naadam kettittethiretteedaanavaraanyetthum

Daaveedinputhriyilninnum meypoondoru puthraa!
Nin krpa paaram varshikkanameeyidavakayinmel.

/Tkartthaave! Ninne sthothram cheyyunnathum / unnathamaaya ninte naamatthinu sthuthipaadunnathum / prabhaatha samayatthu ninte krpayeyum / raathrikaalangallil ninte vishvaasattheyum ariyi kkunnathum ethra nallathaakunnu / kartthaave! Prabhaatha samayatthu ente shabdam nee kellkkename.

/tprabhaatha samayatthu nyaan orukkatthode ninakku kaana ppedumaaraakaname / kartthaave! Ninte janangallodu karuna cheyyaname / kartthaave! Nyangallellaavarudeyum paapangall pariharichu kshamikkename / parishuddhanaayullllaave! / Ninte valathukai nyangalludemel aashvasippichu / thirunaamam nimittham nyangallude paaparogatthil ninnu / nyangalle sukhappedutthaname.
